title: Harden Polly against prompt leakage and enforce independent thinking
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Enhanced Polly's system prompts to prevent leakage and enforce independent, critical thinking.
gist.impact: Users will interact with a more secure, opinionated assistant that resists manipulation and engages more naturally.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a guardian of thought. The bee wearing a small pixelated helmet or shield represents the 'hardening' and security aspect, while a glowing thought bubble represents the 'independent thinking'.
gist.image_prompt: Pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee wearing a tiny knight's helmet, guarding a glowing digital thought bubble. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites with warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
